headline: Panama closes 1.2 billion-euro loan with Bank of America subsidiary
summary: Panama's government has closed a 1.2 billion euros loan with a two-year maturity with a subsidiary of Bank of America, the Economy Ministry said a statement on Thursday. The ministry...
